	<e:Label id="fish_btn_captcha_title" text="获取验证码" size="20" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0x44690f" textColor.disabled="0xa3a5a0" textColor.disabledAndSelected="0x8a8c88" text.down="获取验证码" text.downAndSelected="重新获取"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

                    textColor="0xffffff" textColor.disabled="0x222222" width="100%" height="24" size="22" />
    <e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10" text=""
                    textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="22" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="FishActivitySkin" width="780" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image x="0" width="100%" source="datanchuang" bottom="0"/>

	<e:Image width="144" height="90" x="423" y="19" source="fish_title_hd"/>
	<e:Button id="fish_btn_close" label="Button" x="706" y="55" skinName="FishCloseButtonSkin"/>
	<e:Rect width="162.5" height="364" x="10.5" y="108" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" ellipseWidth="20" ellipseHeight="20" fillColor="0x5a5fa4" fillAlpha="0.5"/>
	<e:Button id="fish_activity_type_btn_bind" label="Button" x="20" y="183" skinName="FishShopTypeButtonSkin"/>
	<e:Button id="fish_activity_type_btn_sign" label="Button" x="20" y="122" skinName="FishShopTypeButtonSkin"/>
	<e:Image x="15.5" y="436" source="fish_shop_tixing"/>
	<e:Panel id="fish_activity_panel_bind" width="575" height="340.5" x="184" y="122" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Image width="441" height="97" source="fish_hd_bdsjh" horizontalCenter="0" top="16"/>
		<e:Button id="fish_activity_btn_captcha" label="Button" x="300" y="200" skinName="FishCaptchaButtonSkin" anchorOffsetX="0" width="136"/>

		<ns1:FishInput id="fish_activity_input_phone" width="300" height="40" x="138" y="150" skinName="FishInputSkin"/>
		<ns1:FishInput id="fish_activity_input_captcha" width="153" height="40" x="138" y="200" skinName="FishInputSkin"/>
		<e:Button id="fish_activity_btn_bind" label="Button" x="195" y="269" skinName="FishOKButtonSkin"/>
	</e:Panel>
	<e:Panel id="fish_activity_panel_sign" width="575" height="340.5" x="184" y="122" visible="false">
		<e:Image width="448" height="2" source="fish_hd_fgx" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-33.25"/>
		<e:Button id="fish_sign_btn_get" label="Button" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="5.5" skinName="FishGetButtonSkin"/>
		<e:Image width="476" height="145" source="fish_hd_mrqd" horizontalCenter="0.5" top="-7"/>
		<ns1:FishSignItem id="fish_sign_item_1" width="72" height="112" x="20" y="146" skinName="FishSignItemSkin"/>
		<ns1:FishSignItem id="fish_sign_item_2" width="72" height="112" x="96.83333333333333" y="146" skinName="FishSignItemSkin"/>
		<ns1:FishSignItem id="fish_sign_item_3" width="72" height="112" x="174.66666666666666" y="146" skinName="FishSignItemSkin"/>
		<ns1:FishSignItem id="fish_sign_item_4" width="72" height="112" x="251.5" y="146" skinName="FishSignItemSkin"/>
		<ns1:FishSignItem id="fish_sign_item_5" width="72" height="112" x="329.3333333333333" y="146" skinName="FishSignItemSkin"/>
		<ns1:FishSignItem id="fish_sign_item_6" width="72" height="112" x="406.16666666666663" y="146" skinName="FishSignItemSkin"/>
		<ns1:FishSignItem id="fish_sign_item_7" width="72" height="112" x="484" y="146" skinName="FishSignItemSkin"/>
	</e:Panel>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="FishCannonSkin" width="186" height="158" currentState="wait" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="wait,other,self">
	<e:Image id="fish_cannon_bg" width="186" height="78" x="0" y="0" source="paodi" includeIn="other,self" y.other="95.3" y.self="95.8" height.other="62" height.self="62"/>
	<e:Panel id="fish_cannon_container" width="119.67" height="156" includeIn="other,self" x="56" y="0.5" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" touchEnabled.self="false" touchEnabled.other="false" touchChildren.other="false" touchChildren.self="false" x.other="33.16" y.other="0" x.self="32">
	</e:Panel>
	<e:Image width="109" height="66" x="61.5" y="12" source="paozhong" includeIn="other,self" y.other="105.3" y.self="105.2" x.other="48.5" width.other="87" height.other="52" width.self="87" height.self="52" x.self="46.5"/>
	<e:Image width="57" height="51" x="159.5" y="27" source="paohong" includeIn="other,self" y.other="117.5" y.self="107" width.other="45" height.other="41" x.other="131.5" x.self="120.5"/>
	<e:Image width="57" height="51" x="19.5" y="80" source="paohong" rotation="270" includeIn="other,self" y.other="157.5" y.self="160" x.other="12.5" width.other="45" height.other="41" x.self="16.5"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="fish_label_cannon_level_self" width="80" height="30" includeIn="self" x="90" y="144" anchorOffsetX="40" anchorOffsetY="15" text="9000" font="fish_font_4_fnt" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="fish_label_cannon_level_other" width="80" height="30" includeIn="other" x="90" y="144" font="fish_font_4_fnt" text=" 10000" anchorOffsetX="40" anchorOffsetY="15" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Button id="fish_btn_cannon_down" label="Button" skinName="FishDownButtonSkin" includeIn="self" anchorOffsetX="45" anchorOffsetY="45" x="37" y="134"/>
	<e:Button id="fish_btn_cannon_up" label="Button" skinName="FishUpButtonSkin" includeIn="self" anchorOffsetX="45" anchorOffsetY="45" x="148" y="132"/>
	<e:Image width="140" height="52" includeIn="wait" x="23" y="106" source="dengdai"/>
	<e:Label id="fish_label_cannon_wait" text="等待入座" includeIn="wait" x="93" y="132" size="20" textColor="0xbfdaf6" anchorOffsetX="40" anchorOffsetY="10"/>
	<e:Image id="fish_img_self_flag" includeIn="self" x="92" y="79.5" source="dingwei" anchorOffsetX="115" anchorOffsetY="115" scaleX="0.7" scaleY="0.7" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Image id="fish_img_self_flag2" includeIn="self" x="26.34" y="-57" source="zheli" touchEnabled="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="FishLoadingSkin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >



	<e:Group width="1280" height="720" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.8"/>
		<e:Image id="fish_loading_bg" width="540" height="236" source="" fillMode="clip" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-20" x="370" y="222" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="fish_loading_progress" text="加载中..." y="495.26" anchorOffsetX="0" width="500" textAlign="center" anchorOffsetY="0" height="41" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalCenter="0" textColor="0x12d1c0" x="390" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label text="著作权人：杭州唐游网络科技有限公司  出版服务单位：浙江省期刊总社有限公司 审批文号：新广出审[2018]1727号 \n出版物号：ISBN 978-7-498-05063-2 文网游备字[2018] M-CSG 0602号" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalCenter="0.5" bottom="82" size="18" lineSpacing="5" x="180" y="597" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label text="抵制不良游戏 拒绝盗版游戏 注意自我保护 谨防受骗上当\n适度游戏益脑 过度游戏伤身 合理安排时间 享受健康生活" size="18" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="16" textColor="0x21c9dd" lineSpacing="5" x="416" y="663" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="FishUserInfoSkin" width="192" height="114" currentState="wait" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="wait,normal,other"  width.normal="192" height.normal="114" width.other="192" height.other="90">
	<e:Image x="0" y="0" includeIn="normal,other" visible="true" source="fish_user_bg" scale9Grid.other="4,4,4,4" anchorOffsetY.other="0" height.other="90"/>
	<e:Image width="46" height="46" includeIn="normal,other" x="8" y="7" source="User_touxiang"/>
	<e:Image id="fish_img_avatar" width="46" height="46" includeIn="normal,other" x="8" y="7" source=""/>
	<e:Label id="fish_label_nickname" text="昵称" includeIn="normal,other" x="59" y="8.25" size="20" textAlign="left" textColor="0x27e3e8" anchorOffsetX="0" width="126.5" anchorOffsetY="0" height="22.75" verticalAlign="middle" multiline="false" wordWrap="false" y.normal="18" x.normal="60" x.other="60" y.other="18"/>
	<e:Label id="fish_label_id" text="id" includeIn="normal,other" x="59" y="31.25" size="16" textAlign="left" textColor="0x27e3e8" anchorOffsetX="0" width="126.5" anchorOffsetY="0" height="21.75" verticalAlign="middle" multiline="false" wordWrap="false" visible.normal="false" visible.other="false"/>
	<e:Image width="178" height="26" includeIn="normal,other" x="7" y="57" source="fish_user_xinxi" scale9Grid="4,4,4,4" anchorOffsetX="0"/>
